name: Dish Stacker
description:
Welcome to Dish Stacker

Test your sense of balance in addictive game Dish Stacker!

✔ DESTRUCTIBLE OBJECTS!

Be careful! All the dishes in Dish Stacker can be detroyed to pieces. But that does not mean you will lose the game. You can still stack new dishes and move higher and higher! You lose only if anything falls from the platform.

✔ REALISTIC 2D PHYSICS!

There are no limits! You can swing around with all the dishes as you want. Build your tower wisely!

✔ ONLINE HIGH SCORES!

Fight with other players by getting higher scores! Share you result online and get a medal!
